sentences.sContent: The threat was only a bluff.
sentences.sCn: 这种威胁不过是吓唬人而已。

sentences.sContent: Whatever you say, you must do it. This isn’t a game of bluff .
sentences.sCn: 不管你说什么，你一定得去做，这可不是在唬人。

phrases.pCn: 伪装而得以幸免；蒙混过关

remMethod.val: 和buffalo(美洲野牛)一起记， buffalo bluffs(野牛虚张声势)

words.tran: 陡峭地；船头扁平地；率直地；粗率地
吓唬人的人；用假像骗人的人

trans.tranCn: 虚张声势； 悬崖峭壁
trans.tranOther: an attempt to deceive someone by making them think you will do something, when you do not intend to do it
